title: build: remove swig Makefiles once go tool handles swig
body:
Searching for Make.pkg reveals 3 places it is still relied on:

misc/cgo/test/Makefile:		1		45
misc/swig/callback/Makefile:		1		13
misc/swig/stdio/Makefile:		1		13

and no places where it exists.  Also, it is mentioned as needed in cgo's godoc.
